trans-unit.source: Specifies the painting style applied to multiple <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> objects contained in a form.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o estilo de pintura aplicado a vários objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> contidos em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode> is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class and sets the painting style for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects that have their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode> é usado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> classe e define o estilo de pintura para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objetos que têm suas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: You cannot explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to Custom, however the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is returned Custom when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to an extension of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class that is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode definir explicitamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> personalizada, no entanto, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> é retornado personalizada quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> é definido como uma extensão do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> classe que não seja <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the use of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> other than <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica o uso de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> em vez de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the use of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: Indica o uso de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> para pintar.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the use of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: Indica o uso de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" /> para pintar.
